text:
This screen lists all talks contained in your custom album

For each talk, the date at the top right is when this talk was published. The number below it is the total running time for each talk.

Selecth the '+' button at the top right to add a new talk to the album.

To delete a talk, or to share or add a note to it,, slide your finger right to left on the talk.  This will bring up a menu allowing you to do these operations.

Select the talk to play it.
